thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Melanie Kiernan
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Melanie Kiernan

author: Melanie Kiernan
title: Melanie Kiernan
text: It was easy to find the exact dress I wanted and at a great price. It was even delivered quicker than I expected which was a great surprise. I am delighted with my dress and can't wait for everyone to see it on the big day.
